original_text: “If your brother becomes poor and cannot maintain himself with you, you shall support him as though he were a stranger and a sojourner, and he shall live with you.
korean_text: 네 형제가 가난하게 되어 빈 손으로 네 곁에 있거든 너는 그를 도와 거류민이나 동거인처럼 너와 함께 생활하게 하되

sentences.original_text: and cannot maintain himself with you,
sentences.korean_translation: 너와 함께 자신을 부양할 수 없게 되면,

sentences.original_text: as though he were a stranger and a sojourner,
and he shall live with you.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 너와 함께 살아야 할 것입니다.
